name: 雪嶺突襲
description: 為了應付極寒地帶日益增長的威脅，司令部需要一支新的部隊，需要高冷如冰山，冷血無情的士兵——雪嶺突襲部隊就這樣誕生了。

wikiSkinData.lore: They could have sent an army—twelve helicarriers boasting hypercoil cannons, pulse-jumping shocktroopers, and mechs to carve through the ice. But instead, a lone, grizzled veteran striding across the tundra. Some things are better left to the Grand General.

skins.name: 極地狙擊手 凱特琳

wikiSkinData.lore: Very few snipers can cut it on the Arctic front. The cold is unforgiving, the winds are harsh, and any who dare brave the tundra find themselves at the mercy of Caitlyn, a sniper with deadly aim and a killer instinct.

skins.name: 雪嶺突襲 古拉格斯

wikiSkinData.lore: A large man even before donning his hermetically sealed arctic combat suit, Gragas is a mystery to all save for High Command's secretive R&D labs. He appears human by all measures, save for the mask he never removes, and the eerily cold mixture of chemicals powering his massive frame.

High Command's public stance towards ninjas are joking-to-nonexistent, as this is a war of modern weapons, not medieval flights of fancy. Privately, they deploy Kennen to hot zones in the deep Arctic, relying on his finely honed ninjitsu and deadly precision.

skins.name: 北極風暴 弗力貝爾

wikiSkinData.lore: It's easy to get used to having a bear in the platoon. He never gets cold, he sleeps all the time, and he can tear through a fully armored regiment of enemy soldiers in about six seconds. It's very easy to get used to having a bear in the platoon.

Varus leaps from the rampart, a hail of arrows flying from his bow and freezing the ground beneath his victims. As they struggle to regroup, he draws a missile—circuits flashing along its spine—and lets fly. Thanks for the archer, High Command!
